text:
With Jakarta taking ownership of the NetComponents package it would be nice if 
the ant tasks that use NetComponents.jar would use the commons-net package 
instead.  The should just involves changing the package name in the import 
statements.
creator: RussellDittmar@charter.net

text:
I should run more queries before posting.  Sorry.
